name: Shadow Elf High Priest
description: The Shadow Elf High Priest is a Medium humanoid, notable for its dark robes and a commanding presence, utilizing a mace for melee combat.
memorable: A powerful spellcaster with exceptional wisdom, capable of manipulating the battlefield with shadow magic and devastating spells.
goals: To serve as a guardian and powerful spellcaster for followers of its dark and mysterious ways.
relations: Can command followers and allies among shadow elves and serve a dark deity.
environment: Typically found in dark, mysterious places, possibly within temples or areas of shadow.
strengths: Exceptional spellcasting abilities with a focus on battlefield control and supportive spells.
weaknesses: Moderate in direct melee combat; relies heavily on spellcasting for offense.
attacks: Utilizes a mace for melee attacks, dealing bludgeoning damage, and casts spells for radiant and area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Insect Plague, creating a hazardous area filled with biting insects that control movement and deal significant damage.
senses: Darkvision allows it to see in darkness up to 120 feet.
skills: Skilled in medicine and insight, providing strong non-combat capabilities.
additional_information: Innate shadow magic allows for spells with no material components.
Can cast debilitating spells to hinder enemies significantly.
Access to unique spells for healing and divination.
Summons a spectral guardian to protect allies.
Can create difficult terrain with webs to control battlefield movement.
spellcasting: Proficient 11th-level spellcaster with a variety of cleric spells focused on control and support.
test_queries: High priest that summons spectral guardians
